definition: full up/classifier for items of clothing (old)
the left-radical form of Kangxi radical 145, 衣[yi1]

sentences.english: Wish you a Marry Christmas and Happy New Year.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝，也祝妳聖誔節快樂，新年蒙褔。

sentences.english: Being loved is a blessing; to love is courage.
sentences.chinese: 被愛是幸褔，主動去愛是勇敢。

sentences.english: Trees are closely associated with a happy human life.
sentences.chinese: 樹與人類餬口幸褔息息相關。

sentences.english: Bereavements and blessings, one following another, make us sad and biessed by turns.
sentences.chinese: 喪親之痛和緈褔祝願，彼此相接，使我們悲喜交加。

sentences.english: A person who is unfilial to his parents and disrespectful to his elders cannot possibly attain blessings and protection.
sentences.chinese: 一個不孝父母，不敬長老的人，是不可能獲得褔佑的。
把祝褔送給我所有的朋友。

sentences.english: The health and well-being of employees is central to their productivity.
sentences.chinese: 員工的健康和幸褔與其生產力息息相關。

definition: surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
dialectal or obsolete equivalent of 媽|妈[ma1]/Taiwan pr. [ma1]
(history) to have an audience with the Emperor
double happiness (similar to 喜喜)/symbol of good luck, esp. marriage
a legendary beauty who flew to the moon/the lady in the moon
warm and virtuous/(used in given names)/Taiwan pr. [shu2]
(archaic) to present/to bequeath/variant of 貽|贻[yi2]
